body: Dwarves with this racial trait grew up facing the abominations that live deep beneath the surface. They receive a +2 dodge bonus to AC against monsters of the aberration type and a +2 racial bonus to their CMB on attempts made to grapple such creatures (or to continue a grapple). This racial trait replaces the defensive training racial trait.
name: Deep Warrior
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Races/Dwarves/Alternate Racial Traits/Deep Warrior
